column4: iam not able to play videos when i play songs, and vice versa, and also iam not able to play songs when i play videos on youtube , any suggestions ?
what plugin/package do i need to fix this problem ?
i suspect you need various restricted formats (i.e. stuff which is free to download, but which ubuntu cannot freely distribute on the main cd) : https://wiki.ubuntu.com/RestrictedFormats
hold on, do you mean you're problem is you can't play videos and songs simultaneously?
that's probably hard to get working on Linux
since technically the video is using sound too
my friend using ubuntu, is able to play audio and video simultaneously
can you get sound from YouTube at all?
because people have had problems with that: http://www.dougdockery.com/2006/07/31/youtube-sound-fix-or-alsa-oss-saves-the-day/
hey, i found something check it out - http://news.u32.net/articles/2006/08/04/oss-forever-playing-multiple-sounds-simultaneously
